Management of Systems Projects

Course Content

About this Course

The course addresses the management of a technical progress from concept to operation use, with emphasis on the functions roles, and responsibilities of the project manager. From the development of a proposal to the delivery of a product to a customer the efforts to conceive, plan, budget, schedulemonitor, control/direct, Read More ...
